text: Shane Robert Bieber (born May 31, 1995) is an American professional baseball pitcher for the Cleveland Guardians of Major League Baseball (MLB). He was named an All-Star in 2019 and 2021. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Cleveland Guardians players Category:People from Orange, California Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Shane Bieber
